body.name: Gotham Steel Air Fryer Basket for Oven, 2 Piece Nonstick Air Fryer Tray + Basket, Copper Crisper Tray, Air Fryer Pan for Oven Great for Baking & Crisping Foods, Dishwasher Safe – 16.5” x 12”
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 44 mins
features: GOTHAM STEEL COOKWARE - with over 30 million happy customers, Gotham Steel has revolutionized kitchens across the world with the introduction of the nonstick ceramic copper cookware! New for 2021, our frying pans have improved in every area including the nonstick coating, stay cool handles, exterior finish and durability, including infusing diamond-like particles to the surface to ensure the pan doesn’t scratch! Enjoy and welcome to the Gotham Steel family.

ULTIMATE CERAMIC NONSTICK – the Gotham Steel nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.
HEALTHY & NON-TOXIC – the Gotham Steel Ti-Cerama coating is free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for a healthy and safe experience day in and out.
EFFORTLESS CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE– spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.
OVEN SAFE - compatible with all ovens and can handle up to 500 degrees

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elevated Mesh Basket Mesh basket is elevated above the tray allowing the entire contents of the tray to be surrounded & absorb the heat being emitted. This allows the inside to be soft yet fully cooked, and the outside to be super crunchy and crisp, the best possible texture one can achieve in food! Grease also drips right out of the mesh basket onto the bottom tray for easy disposal. Works like an Oil-less fryer with al the benefits of non stick Ticerama Cookware & doesn't take up as much space or power.

CERAMIC COATED BASKET HELPS AIR TO CIRCULATE AROUND FOOD The Gotham Steel Crisper tray consists of two removable pieces; 1. The bottom Tray which catches grease and lifts the mesh basket. Can even be used alone as a griddle. 2. Mesh basket with handles for easy removal. Both are non stick, non scratch & for your convenience, dishwasher safe! COOKS EVENLY ON ALL SIDES Since it's made of our patented Ticerama coating, there's no need for oil, butter or seasoning on your Gotham Steel Crisper Tray. Everything slides right off with ease, so you can make chicken with sweet sauce & not have to worry about it getting stuck in the basket! EASY CLEANUP AND DISHWASHER SAFE Having a BBQ & trying to grill some veggies or smaller sized meats? We know, they always seem to fall off the BBQ rack. Non anymore! Place Your Gotham Crisper Basket directly on the grill & start BBQ'ing anything no matter the size! NO NEED TO FLIP YOUR FOOD No more needing to flip your food over, ever again! When cooking, heat is evenly distributed & penetrates food from all sides. One & done, just slide your Gotham Steel Crisper into the oven & take it out when it's ready. Saving you time, effort & giving you peace of mind.

Gotham Steel PRO Crisper Tray XLARGE- Providing You with a Healthier Alternative to Deep Frying Now, you can make your favorite 'fried' foods without oil or butter & right in your oven! Our crisper tray works like an oil-less fryer taking up less pace & energy and can even be used to grill & bake foods too. Ticerama; What Makes It so Great: Made of our signature coating of Titanium & Ceramic. These two natural materials allow our cookware to be super sturdy & completely non- stick. Titanium providing strength & long lasting durability, ceramic allows foods to slide right out with no sticking. Dishwasher SafeSafe to use with Metal UtensilsFlame proof up to 400 degreesOven safe up to 400 degreesNo oil & No butter neededCan be used separately as wellElevated tray for even heat distributionEasy to use; perfect for everyone from beginners to experienced chefsHealthier meals, PTFE/ PFOA/PFOS Free Make bacon & even steaks in your Gotham Steel crisper tray & watch as the grease drips right out of the basket into the tray. Less grease & less fat leads to a healthier heart & lower cholesterol levels. Best of all, no need for oil or butter either! Use it in the oven or outside on your grill! Make 'fried' chicken, fish and vegetables with the best possible texture- crisp & crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. No cooking skills necessary, easy to use for everyone from beginners to experienced chefs. When you're ready to serve, food slides right out! leads to a healthier heart & lower cholesterol levels. Best of all, no need for oil or butter either! Use it in the oven or outside on your grill! Onion rings, fries, pigs in a blanket, pizza logs, mozzarella sticks & more can all be made in your Gotham Steel crisper Tray with no oil & no butter! Make your kids favorite snacks the healthier way and in in just minutes. When you're done, cleaning is a breeze because the Gotham Steel Crisper Tray is completely dishwasher safe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect size tray. It holds quite a bit. Easy cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Great for air frying in my oven, cleans up so easy; a good value as well. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air fryer pan for oven
reviews.reviewText: easy to use - no extra appliances - use it with great control on regular/covection oven - perfect results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just bought an oven with an air fryer. We eat alot of veggies and needed a larger basket. This one has worked out great. It looks great and is very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean air fry tray
reviews.reviewText: When I retired last August, I bought a new oven with an air fryer function. This (Samsung) oven that I love so much did NOT come with an air fryer tray (why, Samsung???) so I had to order one. I found this one, and it's large enough to make a lot of food, and very easy to clean. It does indicate that it's dishwasher safe, but I always handwash it because it's so easy to clean. The basket is made of copper coated wire, and is a little flimsy. The tray is very sturdy, I wish that the tray was also. This gets used all the time to air fry foods that used to be cooked in oil, so we are saving calories and cooking oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product as described
reviews.reviewText: I like the larger size to use in my oven w/air fryer mode. The design is definitely the way to go, and clean up is very easy. I do agree with other reviewer as the pan is a bit flimsy and warps at air fryer heat of 400 degrees. It would seem that the manufacturer would have seen this issue too. It should be able to withstand the heat as it is made for specifically for air frying. The pan does return to it's original shape once cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very good size/capacity. We’ve used it several times now and very happy with the crisping performance.I have been hand cleaning it as I was a bit confused about whether the basket and tray can safely be used in the dishwasher. That said, hand cleaning was not a problem.

This is the second Gotham Steel Crisper tray I have bought. I found my first one too small for some meals so decided to get a bigger one. This one was bigger then I thought but is great for a family of 4. Delivery was as promised and look forward to using it.
Great for grilling vegetables. Very easy to clean. I would highly recommend it.
Item arrived on time as described. Makes crispy fries without oil.
